WorkItem.Description:
When will the Power Collection be brought up to date? Amoung the issues are:

1) Use of an out of date version of NUnit

WorkItem.Summary: Bringing Power collections up to date

Comments.Message:
I have power collections running under VS2010 and NUnit 2.5.10. I have been making it styleCop compliant. The Library is now down to 22 issues! The Unit Tests are next!

I have just tried resetting from Framework 2.0 to 4.0 - the test RandomShuffle1 failed first time I ran it under 4.0, however I have rerun the entire test suite and it passed 100%.
